scripts.ks:developer: mkdir developer && cd developer && echo # New_KS_Project > briefing.md && echo # Dictionary > disctionary.txt && echo # Notes > notes.txt && cd ../
scripts.ks:dist: mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir css && mkdir img && mkdir js && mkdir html && cd ../
scripts.ks:src: mkdir src && cd src && mkdir components && mkdir styles && mkdir types && mkdir utils && echo. > main.ts && cd styles && mkdir scss && cd scss && mkdir header && mkdir main && mkdir variables && cd variables && mkdir variables-scss && echo. > _index.scss && cd ../ && mkdir mixins && cd mixins && mkdir mixins-scss && echo. > _index.scss && cd ../ && echo // SASS > style.scss && cd ../../../
scripts.ks:project: mkdir new_ks_project && cd new_ks_project && mkdir developer && cd developer && echo # New_Project > briefing.md && echo # Dictionary > disctionary.txt && echo # Notes > notes.txt && cd ../ && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir css && mkdir img && mkdir js && mkdir html && cd ../ && mkdir src && cd src && mkdir components && mkdir styles && mkdir types && mkdir utils && echo. > main.ts && cd styles && mkdir scss && cd scss && mkdir header && mkdir main && mkdir variables && cd variables && mkdir variables-scss && echo. > _index.scss && cd ../ && mkdir mixins && cd mixins && mkdir mixins-scss && echo. > _index.scss && cd ../ && echo // SASS > style.scss && cd ../../../ && echo node_modules > .gitignore && echo. > tsconfig.json && echo # New_KS_Project > README.md && npm init -y
